local_intent: Execute a 0.1 m push at 90 degrees along the cloth edge after confirming visibility, aligning, and yawing; then pause and retreat.
assumptions: Cloth target and edge identifiers are valid
Controller handles safe approach height without explicit lowering
Workspace is clear for a 0.1 m push at 90 deg
coherence_with_global: Follows perceive (visibility with retry) → align → set yaw → push (annotated) → wait → retreat, matching the global plan for folding via an edge push.
